Product id: sdb-vtb1416 fabric colour: steel grey material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes estella blackout steel grey 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Occa Blackout Carbon Rigid Pvc 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Occa blackout is ideal for your kitchen, bathroom and commercial environments for a very affordable price. This grey vertical blind has rigid pvc slats so has no need for weights and chains and is ideal for damp and hot environments due to the waterproof and flame retardant fabric. Product id: db-dvtb1119 fabric colour: carbon material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating headrail: metal headrail slat width: 89mm control type: wand and cord energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes occa blackout carbon rigid pvc 89mm vertical blind in grey.
